name: SpaceShot (itch) (bobojo)
description:
Controls:
general movement:  w s a d
dash:  q e
shoot:  spacebar

Be sure to check out the settings, the difficulty slider's cool!

This game is a fun little mix between Asteroids and Galaga. It’s also got a boss battle that's pretty tough. You shoot enemy ships and fight stronger ones as you go for long as possible

This game was made in 1 week from Jan 25 to Jan 31, 2022 as a challenge and there's a decent amount of polish that considered.

There are arrow key controls as well but I think most people would try that without checking. 

If you want to play fullscreen you can go here:  https://pixelpad.io/app/sumexhfbxjd/?emb=1

Programming: William Sokol,  Contacts
3D model: Nikolai Sokol

Music used:
Menu Screen by Jonny Easton Link: https://youtu.be/0ByCY7xdkR4.
